title: Drought, water overuse prompt Arizona to limit construction in some fast-growing parts of Phoenix - The Associated Press
summary: Arizona will not approve new housing construction on the fast-growing edges of metro Phoenix that rely on groundwater to address long-term water supply concerns. Developers could still build in the affected areas but would need to find alternative water sources, such as surface or recycled water. The move is part of a broader effort to protect the state's groundwater supplies amid a multi-decade drought.

title: Targus Launches Eco-Friendly Backpack with Built-In Find My Locator to Easily Find Your Tech and Other Personal ... - PR Newswire
summary: Targus has released the Cypress™ Hero Backpack with Find My® Locator, an eco-friendly backpack made from 26 recycled water bottles. The backpack features a built-in location module that pairs with the Apple Find My network, allowing users to track their backpack and personal items. The backpack is also designed with comfort in mind, with adjustable, ergonomic shoulder straps and a padded back panel.
product_or_process: Cypress™ Hero Backpack with Find My® Locator

title: 30 sustainable and ethical fashion brands to shop now - Marie Claire UK
summary: Fashion brands are increasingly emphasizing sustainable practices like using environmentally friendly fabrics and manufacturing techniques. Consumers can identify genuine sustainable efforts by checking for B Corp certification, reading brand sustainability reports, and considering the brand's overall environmental impact. Sustainable fashion choices can include buying secondhand, using pre-loved fashion sites, or renting clothes.
greenwashing: The article does not provide evidence of greenwashing.

title: Novelis Enters Long-Term Agreement to Supply Aluminum Beverage Can Sheet to The Coca-Cola System - PR Newswire
summary: Novelis Inc., a leading sustainable aluminum solutions provider, has signed a new long-term contract with Coca-Cola Bottlers' Sales & Services Company (CCBSS) to supply aluminum can sheet for The Coca-Cola Company's family of iconic brands. The contract includes an agreement for closed-loop recycling, highlighting both companies' commitments to sustainability. Novelis' new, low-carbon facility in Bay Minette, Alabama, will be the first fully integrated aluminum manufacturing and recycling plant built in the U.S. in nearly 40 years.
